function apiRemoveMySelf(item)
Remove an auth key of the api
function checkTheAutoSelect()
This function select the key present in listOfAutoSelect
function chooseGPGPath()
Choose a gpg executable and set the values of the options.
function choosePrivateKey()
Show a dialog (list.xul) to choose a private key.
function choosePublicKey(preSelect)
Show a dialog (list.xul) to choose a list of public keys (array).
function crypt()
Encrypt the current data of the editor.

keyIdList,
fromGpgAuth,

keyIdList,

Decrypt the current data of the editor.
decrypt: function(text,
password)
Decrypt a text.
decrypt_user_token: function(e)
This function is called to decrypt the data sent by the server that is encrypted with the users public key
function EnigConvertGpgToUnicode(text)
Convert the gpg --with-collums text (who are strangly encoded) into a uniform Unicode string.
function EnigConvertToUnicode(text,
charset)
Convert the text, in the specified chaset, into an Unicode string.
function eraseSavedPassword()
This function erase the saved password (it’s for exemple when a sign failled)
function fileSelector()
Open the file selected and return the choosen file.
function filter()
This function filter the key list, based on the current value of search-textbox.
function fireGPGDebug(message,
debugCode,
fatal)
Check if debuggin is enabled and if yes show up messages in console
generate_random_token: function(e)
This is just a random string generator.
function genreate_api_key()
Generate and random string between 64 and 128 charactes, probably unique.

Return the commons arugments for all GnuPG’s commands

Get the content of a binary file
function getContent(aURL)
Get the content of a resource form anywhere (like chrome://)
Get the content of a web resource by using a xmlhttprequest.

charset)

Return the custom arguement the user want to add.

Return the command to execute GnuPG
getGPGCommentArgument: function()
Return a arguement to add a gnupg comment.

Return a arguement to force gnupg to use not trusted keys.

This function have to be documented.

save_password,
domain)

domain / *default =  false*/)
This function uses getPassword() to get a password for a private key.

Return the content of a script to execute GnuPG.
function getSavedPassword()
function getSelectedText()
Return the current selected text of the editor.
function getSelfKey()
Function who return a private key for the user (the default or the one selected in the list) null is returned if no key is selected.
function getTmpDir()
Get the path of a tmp file.
function getTmpFile(permission /* optional */,
 suffix_file)
Get an unique temporary file name.
function getTmpFileExeRunning()
Get an unique temporary file nam for executable files (.exe) The path + filename is returned.
function getTmpFileRunning()
Get an unique temporary file name, who can be executed (scripts).
function getTmpPassFile()
Get an unique, temporary file name, for password (so it’s random).
function gmailWrapping(text)
This fuction approximates gmail’s line-wrapping rules, so that a message can be wrapped before it’s signed, instead of after, which would break the signature.
var GPGAccessCallerUnixNoXpcom = function(parameters,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on linux and MacOS, when the xpcom is not available.

sdtIn,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on linux and MacOS, when the xpcom is available.

charset)

var GPGAccessCallerWindowsXpcom = function(parameters,
sdtIn,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on windows, when the xpcom is available.
function htmlEncode(s)
Encode special chars (&, <, > et “) to they html values.
isUnix: function()
Return true if we are on a unix system, false if we’re on windows.

This function have to be documented.

function loadXpcom ()
This function try to load the xpcom.
login: function(event)
This function gets called by the “gpg:login” event that is emitted from a gpgAuth enabled website.

This function is called when the Ok button is pressed.

focus_textbox)
Called when change-gpg-path-checkbox is checked/unchecked to enable/disable some elements in the options interface.

This function is called when the list.xul form is show.

This function is called when a new Firefox’s windows is created.

This function have to be documented.

action)
This function is called when a menu item is selected.

This function is called when a private key is selected.
